overview: At the riflery club, Jannis runs into his former schoolmate Marvin, who is hiding from a gang.  The  two  accidentally  mix  up  their  backpacks.  At  the  office  Christmas  party,  Jannis  finds  Marvin‘s  pistol.  He  tries  to  hide  it,  unnoticed  –  above  all,  he  doesn’t  want  his  ex-girlfriend, who is at the party, to see it. But then Marvin shows up at the office and wants his gun back.
tagline: Two former schoolmates meet accidental again at a local shooting range. One of them currently in fear for his live, the other in fear for his love. This encounter evolves into a life changing event for both of them.
title: Big Red Gun
